channel.title: Runserver error
channel.description:
i got this run server error but i dont know how to fix runserver errors
[code]Starting AkonScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 0" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1358) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:23) at server.main(server.java:27) [/code]
can any1 help plz...[br][size=1]Posted on: July 17, 2007, 09:28:27 AM[/size][hr]plz i need some1 to help me fix it doesnt let me log onto my server with that error[br][size=1]Posted on: July 17, 2007, 11:24:11 AM[/size][hr]i new i should of had a backup

item.title: Runserver error
item.dc:creator: @P_16 P 16
